summary: Searchs the first index at which the given value can be found in the array. The corresponding output control port will be activated accordingly.
description: This block is dynamic thus the array type of the input data can be changed using the block configuration dialog.

dataPorts.Index: the first index at which the value can be found. (undefined if not found)

controlPorts.Found: is activated if the value is found.
controlPorts.Not Found: is activated if the value is not found.
